# Scripts

Bundled resources for database-audit-logger skill

- [x] audit_log_generator.py: Generates sample audit log entries for various database operations.
- [x] audit_log_analyzer.py: Analyzes existing database logs to identify potential security threats or compliance issues.
- [x] audit_table_creator.sh: Creates a basic audit table in the database with predefined columns (timestamp, user, operation, etc.).
